languages.text: {n}Кибелла вскидывает бровь, наблюдая, как багровое пятно расходится по одеянию.{/n} "Ты наш{mf|ел|ла} интересное применение сему инструменту. И все же он послужил орудием закалки".
{n}Kibellah raises an eyebrow as she watches a crimson stain spread across her clothes.{/n} "You have found an interesting use for this tool, yet it still serves its purpose."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла вскидывает бровь, наблюдая, как багровое пятно расходится по одеянию.{/n} "Ты наш{mf|ел|ла} интересное применение сему инструменту. И все же он послужил орудием закалки".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah raises an eyebrow, watching a crimson stain on her clothes grow.{/n} "You have found an interesting use for this tool. And yet it still served to strengthen me."

{n}Kibellah raises an eyebrow as she watches a crimson stain spread across her clothes.{/n} "You have found an interesting use for this tool, yet it still serves its purpose."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah levanta una ceja mientras observa la mancha carmesí que empieza a formarse en su ropa.{/n} «Ha encontrado un uso bastante interesante para esa herramienta, pero cumple con su propósito».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah raises an eyebrow as she watches a crimson stain spread across her clothes.{/n} "You have found an interesting use for this tool, yet it still serves its purpose."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah levanta una ceja mientras observa la mancha carmesí que empieza a formarse en su ropa.{/n} «Ha encontrado un uso bastante interesante para esa herramienta, pero cumple con su propósito».

languages.text: {n}キベラは自分の服に紅い染みが広がるのを眺めて眉を顰める。{/n}「この道具の面白い使い方を見つけたようね。でも、きちんと目的を果たしている」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah raises an eyebrow as she watches a crimson stain spread across her clothes.{/n} "You have found an interesting use for this tool, yet it still serves its purpose."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは自分の服に紅い染みが広がるのを眺めて眉を顰める。{/n}「この道具の面白い使い方を見つけたようね。でも、きちんと目的を果たしている」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈看到衣服上浮现了一片深红色的污渍，扬起了一条眉毛。{/n}“你为这件工具找到了有趣的用途。话虽如此，它依然实现了它的目的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah raises an eyebrow as she watches a crimson stain spread across her clothes.{/n} "You have found an interesting use for this tool, yet it still serves its purpose."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈看到衣服上浮现了一片深红色的污渍，扬起了一条眉毛。{/n}“你为这件工具找到了有趣的用途。话虽如此，它依然实现了它的目的。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah hebt eine Augenbraue, als sie sieht, wie ein roter Fleck sich auf ihrer Kleidung ausbreitet.{/n} "Ihr habt eine interessante Anwendung für dieses Werkzeug gefunden, doch es erfüllt noch immer seinen Zweck."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah raises an eyebrow as she watches a crimson stain spread across her clothes.{/n} "You have found an interesting use for this tool, yet it still serves its purpose."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah hebt eine Augenbraue, als sie sieht, wie ein roter Fleck sich auf ihrer Kleidung ausbreitet.{/n} "Ihr habt eine interessante Anwendung für dieses Werkzeug gefunden, doch es erfüllt noch immer seinen Zweck."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah hausse un sourcil alors qu'elle regarde une tache écarlate se répandre sur ses vêtements.{/n} « Vous avez trouvé une façon originale d'employer cet instrument, mais le résultat demeure inchangé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah raises an eyebrow as she watches a crimson stain spread across her clothes.{/n} "You have found an interesting use for this tool, yet it still serves its purpose."

languages.text: {n}Kıyafetlerine bulaşan kan lekesini izlerken Kibellah, tek kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Bu aracı kullanmanın acayip bir yolunu keşfettin ama yine de amacına hizmet etti."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah raises an eyebrow as she watches a crimson stain spread across her clothes.{/n} "You have found an interesting use for this tool, yet it still serves its purpose."
